# Study area

```{r}
remotes::install_github("robinlovelace/ukboundaries")
```

```{r}
uklads = ukboundaries::lad2018
# View(uklads %>% st_drop_geometry())
monmouthshire = uklads %>% filter(lau118nm == "Monmouthshire")
mapview::mapview(monmouthshire)
```
